entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
